name: Double Feature: Northwoods Adventure
overview: An Adventure: Double Feature is a series of two adventure-themed choose your own adventure graphical text adventure. In Northwoods Adventure, the player is off camping with their family, when they wake up early and decide to go exploring. The player can either go for a hike in the woods or go on a canoe trip down down the river. Text descriptions show the journey, and the player is presented with options to travel in different directions, and how to explore the woods. The player can bring with them a walking stick, binoculars, or a compass and map. Players can end up lost in a swamp, twisting their ankle and getting rescued, breaking their canoe on some rapids, and many other outcomes.
